Translations.Text: Inna: "day a kwen amne$ fellas, akken i kwen umne$, zik, $ef gma s? Oebbi Yif akw imearaben. Neppa Iphunu sennig akw ieninen

Mi ldin lqecc nnsen, ufan tu$al iten id selaa nnsen. Nnan: "a babat nne$, ur neb$i tagi, selaa nne$ tu$al a$ d. A d nessikrer i twacult nne$, a neareb $ef gmat nne$, a d nernu ppaabga n ul$wem. Tagi d ppaabga tushilt
Inna: "ur t sedduye$ yidwen, d awez$i, siwa ma tcubkem iyi s Oebbi, ard a yi t id terrem, siwa ma zzin awen". Mi s aahden, inna: "Oebbi d Awkil $ef wayen id nenna
Inna: "a tarwa, ur keccmet si yiwet n tebburt, kecmet si tebbura imgarraden. Ula i wen xedme$, bippa, ar loiha n Oebbi. Aeuddu siwa win n Oebbi. FellaS ppekle$, fellaS ay ppeklen wid ippkalen

Mi kecmen akken i sen iumeo babat sen, ula i sen ixdem, bippa, ar loiha n Oebbi. D ayen ilezmen kan i iseyya Yaqub, deg iman is. Neppa, s tidep, isaa tamusni i s Nesselmed, maca tegwti n yimdanen ur ssinen
Mi kecmen ar Yusef, ibbwi gma s $uoes, inna: "nekkini d gma k, ur $webbel $ef wayen xeddmen
